content.question: Which of the following describes the direction of the forces exerted by the disk and rod on each other during the collision?

choices.label: Direction of Force Exerted on Disk by Rod Direction of Force Exerted on Rod by DiskDown and to the leftTo the right
Direction of Force Exerted on Disk by Rod Direction of Force Exerted on Rod by DiskTo the leftTo the right
Direction of Force Exerted on Disk by Rod Direction of Force Exerted on Rod by DiskDown and to the leftUp and to the right
Direction of Force Exerted on Disk by RodDirection of Force Exerted on Rod by DiskTo the leftUp and to the right

content.answer: Direction of Force Exerted on Disk by Rod Direction of Force Exerted on Rod by DiskTo the leftTo the right

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
